wikipedia_page.main: Philip Stephen Gray OBE (11 March 1923 – 30 November 2012) was an English musical administrator, who managed the Royal Liverpool Philharmonic Orchestra for 23 years.

response: * Stephen Gray (musical administrator) (1923–2012), English musical administrator
**Stephen Gray, 89, musical administrator, managed the Royal Liverpool Philharmonic.
*Stephen Gray, 89, English musical administrator, managed the Royal Liverpool Philharmonic.Stephen Gray, who managed the Royal Liverpool Philharmonic, dies at 89

Chelsea Opera Group is an organisation based in London which arranges concert productions of operas and other works.  It was founded in 1950 when David Cairns and Stephen Gray invited Colin Davis, who was at the time a 22-year-old clarinetist, to conduct a concert performance of Mozart's Don Giovanni in the Holywell Music Room, Oxford.
*(Philip) Stephen Gray, Director, Royal Liverpool Philharmonic Society.
